Field.Title: Description
Field.Value: He is a friend from school, same age as Mali. Into music but not musician himself. Has gone away to uni, but is still in touch with Mali. He’s not big on technology. Will send messages, but likes to talk on the phone. Matthew, a friend from school, same age as Mali. Into music but not musician himself. Has gone away to uni, but is still in touch with Mali. He’s not big on technology. Will send messages, but likes to talk on the phone. Matthew, a friend from school, same age as Mali. Into music but not musician himself. Has gone away to uni, but is still in touch with Mali. He’s not big on technology. Will send messages, but likes to talk on the phone. Tall, blond hair, freckles. Healthy-looking. Big smile and red lips. Usually wears shirts and jeans. A bit preppy.

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description
Field.Value: Name: Tariq; elderly man; Mali’s grandfather. Retired doctor, recruited by the UK to work in the NHS in 1970; now comfortably retired. Grey hair and beard. Has a bit of a belly, but is quite slim otherwise. Always wears trousers, shirt and jumper. If it’s warm, he wears a tank top over his shirt instead of a jumper. Native Urdu speaker, he also encourages Mali to speak it.
